title: BRIEF-Statement Regarding U.S. Department Of Health And Human Services' Announcement On Non-Tobacco Flavored E-Cigarette Products
text:
BRIEF-Statement Regarding U.S. Department Of Health And Human Services' Announcement On Non-Tobacco Flavored E-Cigarette Products

Stock Markets 56 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 06:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Statement Regarding U.S. Department Of Health And Human Services' Announcement On Non-Tobacco Flavored E-Cigarette Products Sept 13 (Reuters) - Pyxus International Inc PYX.N : * STATEMENT REGARDING U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES' ANNOUNCEMENT ON NON-TOBACCO FLAVORED E-CIGARETTE PRODUCTS * PYXUS INTERNATIONAL INC - BANS AND OUTRIGHT RESTRICTIONS OF AN ADULT'S USE OF FLAVORS IN E-LIQUID PRODUCTS "ARE NOT BASED ON SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH"
